description:
Just as Kyoichiro refuses Senge`s invitation, the barrier breaks, and Misaki and Shigure enter the scene. They save Kyoichiro, but when Shigure asks him what he wants to do, he can`t answer. What could a mere student like him accomplish? Meanwhile, Senge and Tatebayashi share their own thoughts about the matter.
Source: crunchyroll
